sentences.en: A special case of this mechanism is the so - called sieve effect.
sentences.cn: 这个机理的特殊情况就是 所谓 的筛分效应.

sentences.en: Cream the margarine in a small bowl, then sieve the icing sugar into it.
sentences.cn: 将人造黄油在小碗里搅成糊状，再将糖粉筛进去。

sentences.en: Dinitropheol exerted its effect on sucrose uptake or secretion into the sieve tubes.
sentences.cn: 二硝基酚影响蔗糖的吸收或者分化到筛管里.

sentences.en: Empty the contents of the pan into the sieve.
sentences.cn: 将锅里的东西倒到筛子上。

sentences.en: Finally, it is like drawing water with a sieve.
sentences.cn: 到头来, 竹篮打水一场空.

sentences.en: It is worth taking the trouble to sieve the fruit by hand.
sentences.cn: 值得费点劲用手挑挑果子。

sentences.en: Liquidize the mixture and then pass it through a sieve.
sentences.cn: 将混合物打成泥状，然后用滤网滤一下。

sentences.en: Pour the swill through a sieve, or it will clog the sewer.
sentences.cn: 倒泔水时过滤一下, 否则容易堵塞下水道.

sentences.en: Press the raspberries through a fine sieve to form a puree.
sentences.cn: 用一把细筛子把黑莓压榨成浓汁。

sentences.en: Rinse rice in a sieve under cool running water.
sentences.cn: 把米放入筛子中,用冷流动水冲洗.

sentences.en: Sieve the flour and cocoa powder into a bowl.
sentences.cn: 把面粉和可可粉筛进碗里。

sentences.en: Strain the juice through a piece of gauze or a sieve.
sentences.cn: 用一块纱布或过滤网将果汁过滤一下。

sentences.en: The next day the team began to sieve the loose, sandy silt around the spot—more hand bones and foot bones turned up.
sentences.cn: 第二天，考察队开始在现场周围用筛子过滤松散的沙质粉土，他们又陆续发现了更多的手骨和足骨。

sentences.en: The student has a memory [ head ] like a sieve.
The workman riddled the cinders ( through a sieve ) to get out the larger pieces.
sentences.cn: 工人筛 煤渣,把大块筛出来.

sentences.en: We can separate the stones out with a sieve.
sentences.cn: 我们可以用一个筛子把石头分离出来。

sentences.en: We often shake flour through a sieve.
sentences.cn: 我们经常用筛子筛面粉.

sentences.en: You can't carry water in a sieve.
You'll need to sieve out the stones from the soil.
sentences.cn: 你得将石块从土中筛出.

words.tran_cn: [粮食][矿业]筛子；滤网；不能保守秘密的人

trans.tran_cn: [粮食][矿]筛子，滤网，不能保守秘密的人，嘴不严的人
trans.tran_en: a round wire kitchen tool with a lot of small holes, used for separating solid food from liquid or small pieces of food from large pieces
to put flour or other food through a sieve
to put flour or other food through a sieve
